item.title: By: towerstorm
item.dc:creator: towerstorm
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/splash/#comment-47">!!!!!!</a>.
Oh I see what you mean, for some reason It's not appearing on Nathans posts. I'll look into it. Can you see the like button on the left hand side along with the tweet / g+ buttons?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to !!!!!!.

Oh I see what you mean, for some reason It’s not appearing on Nathans posts. I’ll look into it. Can you see the like button on the left hand side along with the tweet / g+ buttons?

item.title: By: !!!!!!

item.title: By: towerstorm

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/splash/#comment-45">!!!!!!</a>.
Do you mean you don't like it? Or that you can't click the like button?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to !!!!!!.

Do you mean you don’t like it? Or that you can’t click the like button?
